channel.title: Rep ++ [317]
channel.description: Look, i don't know where i would post this and its not a request... anyway i just need some quick help. dont just sit here and flame please? Alright im looking for a good base to code, i mean a fairly blank one.I NEED it not to be PI please. Im just coding it and making it into a pvp server and im going to add everything pk point system and stuff by myself, but the problem is i need the MOST STABLE source thats not delta, here, all i need is a stable source that you start in edgeville and it looks nice. I'm not a leecher so i dont want a source that has tons of stuff already added. Thanks.

item.title: Rep ++ [317]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Please don’t use Delta… You won’t learn how the server and Runescape protocol works. If you get a framework with next to no features you learn how to add them, it improves your programming abilities, you learn a lot and you can customize your server specifically to your needs.

By building from scratch you can develop your server extremely fast because you understand every single method and variable within the source-code and can use them in the most efficient manner. Having someone else’s bloated source leads to memory leaks due to their poor programming techniques and a slow game filled with content you won’t use.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep ++ [317]
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Logitek link=topic=478061.msg3498568#msg3498568 date=1297545918]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=478061.msg3498561#msg3498561 date=1297545555]

[quote author=Logitek link=topic=478061.msg3498553#msg3498553 date=1297545251]
317s r dead you will get no players and ull be wasting time, if your gona start a server do 508+ and learn the methods and packaging especially if your going to be making a pk server.
[/quote]317s aren’t dead. It’s just stupid fucking idiots who hardcode shit and put 600+ content in 317s which make them suck ass.

fixing delta would b like trying to convert ppl to your religoin over the internet
[/quote]You’re fucking stupid. Delta is fairly easy to clean, and it wouldn’t be hard to change the networking to NIO.

cling to those beliefs vain
[/quote]It’s not a belief. Delta can be completely cleaned in a matter of hours. Then it wouldn’t be that hard to add NIO networking to it.

[quote author=Evocation link=topic=478061.msg3498574#msg3498574 date=1297546290]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=478061.msg3498563#msg3498563 date=1297545678]
I honestly doubt you would be able to, as you lack a bit of knowledge.

Just use a normal Delta, and start reading up on Java.
[/quote]Okay, which client should i use with delta?
[/quote]Standard Deob.[/quote]What do you mean by that? you mean like is that the name of a client?OR do you mean as in like silab soft moparscape clients?
